name: Let's Say You're A Writer
description:
This is a bleak, personal, and ultimately hopeful story about the struggles of being a creative while trying to "make it." 

It assumes you're a writer, but many of the sentiments apply to other creative fields.

Explore the Factory within and discover why production has stopped.

  • Play Time: Roughly 30 minutes
  • Endings: 2 (neither of which are "bad," just different)
  • Mobile devices currently not supported
  • Content Warning: Swearing
